# 7-3
![](figure/ex7.3.png)

## (1)

```{r}
y<-c(-1,1,2,4,4,5)
x<-c(-2,0,1,2,3,4)
mean(y)
mean(x)
#Ybar=2.5
#xbar=1.33
```

## (2)

```{r}
summary(lm(y~x))
#기울기 추정량 = 1.10286
```

## (3)

```{r}
#절편 추정량 =1.1286
```

## (4)

```{r}
anova(lm(y~x))
#잔차제곱합 SSE=0.8143

```
